Only problem I have with it is that the ribbon was not included with the package. I contacted the sender and hope they will ship me the ribbon. If they do, I will gladly have my bridesmaids purchase these.

评论概述: If you’re a curvier woman order a size up
评论详情: The dress is great. I read some reviews before ordering it and I’m glad I did. I usually wear a 6-8 size dress or a medium, but I saw in the reviews that the curvier girls needed to order up a size. This is true it fit perfectly on my hips and it was still a great length. It’s not a stretchy or forgiving dress so if you order a size up and it’s too loose in some areas just have it take in and you’ll be fine!

But even with these features, it still deserves one star only because the fabric feels like sandpaper. It’s that weird fabric that feels scratchy when you rub it one way and fine when the other way. The problem is that its cut isn’t uniform, so it’s constantly chaffing against your skin. It reminds me of bathing suit material. Unless you like the feeling of a hair shirt constantly rubbing all over you, I would not get this dress.

类型: Size: LargeColor: Black Small White Dot
评论详情: The style and fit of this is just perfect! A classy, classic, timeless dress to take a lady from church to afternoon cocktails on the patio. The only negative is the material! This is your Grandma's polyester; 1970s thick, scratchy fabric with very little stretch and zero airflow. If this was any other material I would be back buying every color! The fit is so great on my black polka dot one that I'll keep it for chilly days, but this dress isn't for sunshine or temperatures above 60 without feeling uncomfortable.
